Very Emollient Cream Shave Uncented; Sensitive Skin by Alba Botanica for Unisex; 8 ounce Shave Cream.
body.description: Power-packed with rich botanical emollients, our unscented, soap-free cream shave fights off dryness, chaffing and irksome in-growns.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #150,159 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #80 in Women's Shaving Creams

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Good Product
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Kiss My Face fragrance free moisture shave cream for about 8 years, but it is no longer available.I have been searching for a fragrance-free replacement and have read many reviews on several websites.I have been shaving in the shower for 53 years and it's the last thing I do after washing my hair and body. By then my whiskers are soft and my face is wet.Two products seemed to match my fragrance-free criteria. Alba Botanica Very Emollient Cream unscented and Aveeno Therapeutic Shave Gel with Oat and Vitamin E no scent added. The cost on Amazon Prime is about $.57/oz for each.I loaded a new blade into my Gillette Fusion Power Razor and shaved half my face with each product.The results were equally as good. In fact, much better than the Kiss My Face. You only need small amounts of product and they should last a long time. Each left my face soft, smooth and without irritation.Rinsing the blade in the shower was not a problem, however, the Alba did take longer to rinse, and I can see where it would be more difficult to rinse in the sink.Alba does contain lavender and it is delectable so while it is technically fragrance free it does have a scent.I highly recommend both products and give a slight edge to the Aveeno.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It's almost impossible to find an unscented shaving cream, so I doubly appreciate this one. The cream is thick, doesn't run, and only a tiny bit is required to shave both legs. My husband also likes it for his face, but perhaps a little less than I do. The consistency is different from other products, and if you're used to a foam, this is going to take a little getting used to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it's great... have bought more than once
reviews.reviewText: Finding products that are both unscented and organic is not always easy... this achieves both and I really like it as a product. I would say that it feels almost more lotion-like than typical shaving cream. I would also add that I think a tube of this doesn't last as long as a can of traditional shaving cream, but it's an impression and I haven't actually calculated how long one lasts, versus the other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Messy But Works Well!
reviews.reviewText: I've seen a lot of complaints about this product in the reviews. However, I have been using it for a few years and really like it. First, it is very moisturizing so you do not need to soften your beard first with hot water. A little room temperature or cold water works fine.Second, you only need to spread a thin layer for it to work. It's a bit messy so every few strokes, I wipe off the excess into a tissue. If you do that it will not clog up the razor too much.I get a good shave from it and best of all, it is quick. As long as you wash your face afterwards, you'll be good to go.I buy the unscented because the Mango-Vanilla and Coconut-Lime are both horrible! The scents are overpowering and crude, like a really cheap perfume. I really liked the Aloe-Mint scent, but sadly that one seems to have been discontinued. If Alba is reading this, please bring back the Aloe-Mint, or come up with new, better scents,. Please. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Several reviewers complain about how this product gums up there’re razors. I either haven’t had this problem or I’m simply used to rinsing my razor a few times during every shave. Also, some complain that it doesn’t foam up. Foam is fun but the lack of foam does not impede this product’s performance. I love that it’s fragrance free, creates a smooth shave, moisturizes my skin and is inexpensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Way, way, way too thick. Clogs up razors.
reviews.reviewText: I thought I would love this stuff. I thought buying a thick cream meant that I could use a tiny amount, which meant purchasing less often, which meant using less plastic containers. But it's just unreasonably thick, and it sticks to you almost like Vaseline. Definitely do not use this with billie razors. It gunks it up and destroys the blades after one use. My husband's gillete razor worked a little better because the blades aren't as flat, but it was still a struggle. I really wanted to love it but it had to go in the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product is very much the best shave gel I’ve tried thus far.
reviews.reviewText: Lives up to the very emollient in it’s name. I’ve tried 4 different brands previously and none hydrated and protect the skin as well as this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work so great
reviews.reviewText: Didn't lather and not thick enough. Doesn't work very good

reviews.reviewTitle: Gentle on your skin against the razor
reviews.reviewText: I trust Alba shaving cream to spare my skin on my face when shaving. Yeah, I know, women are 'supposed' to not have to shave their face but here in the real world, if they do, I would recommend this product to save sensitive skin from the ravages of a razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: works great. just not exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: while this works, and is definetly unscented, I find it doesn't work the way I need it to. I'll use up what I bought and find something else. I think the gel just isn't the right type for me. no complaints though!
